input.name: __VIEWSTATE

strong.span: Governer Dewine has shut down in-person learning for the rest of the 2019-2020 year. Remote learning will still take place through the late May closing of our year unless the BOE decides differently.
We will be working to continue planning for the rest of this year and start the planning for Fall 2020.

span.text-node: Stay in contact and via our Social Media platforms to remain informed about the changes that are upon us.
Thank you for your continious support!

span.strong: Google Classroom 101 for Parents and Students

span.span: Click here for food distribution information.

div.span:
3594 N. Snyder Rd.
Trotwood, OH 45426
Phone: 937-854-3050

Spring Break will take place from Saturday, March 21, 2020 through Sunday, March 29, 2020. The Helpdesk will be closed during that time. Our Learning Experiences and Helpdesk services will resume on Monday, March 30th. Enjoy your Spring Break, everyone!
For assistance with technology issues including Google Classroom, please email the Media Specialist for your child’s school. They are happy to help you.

a.onclick: ga('send', 'event', 'URL', 'Link', 'The Parents’ Guide to Google Classroom');
